description: This Dart file defines the DoctorProvider class, which manages the state related to doctors in a Flutter application. It handles fetching doctor data from an API, maintains loading/error states, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: DoctorProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing doctor-related state and data fetching.

methods.name: DoctorProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing the provider with an ApiClient instance.

methods.name: fetchDoctors
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches a list of doctors from the API with optional query, updates state accordingly.
